intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to our website. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the information you provide when using our website and services.

provided.title: 2.1 Information You Provide
provided.desc: When you use our contact form, subscribe to newsletters, or engage in other interactions, we may collect the following information:
items: Other information you choose to share with us

automatic.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
automatic.desc: Our servers may automatically collect the following information:

usage.title: 3. Use of Information
usage.desc: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Respond to your inquiries and support requests
Provide you with relevant information and products
Improve user experience and website performance

security.title: 4. Information Security
security.desc: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.desc: We will not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We will only disclose your information under the following circumstances:
items: You have explicitly consented to us doing so
Required by law or judicial proceedings
To enforce our Terms of Service and other agreements
To protect the rights, privacy, or safety of ourselves, you, or others

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: Our website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your user experience. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.desc: Under applicable data protection laws, you may have the following rights:
items: Access personal information we hold about you
Restrict our use of your personal information
Obtain a copy of your personal information

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or concerns about how we handle your personal information, please contact us through:

changes.title: 9. Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the revised policy on our website and updating the "Last Updated" date.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use this website. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the website indicates your acceptance of any modifications.

license.title: 2. Use License
allowed: View information and documents on the website
prohibited: Copy or modify content on this website without permission
Use this website for any illegal or harmful activities
Attempt unauthorized access to any part of this website
license.intro: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to browse and use the content on this website.

ip.title: 3. Intellectual Property Rights
ip.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and data compilations, is the proprietary property of ours or our content providers. This content is protected by copyright and other applicable intellectual property laws.

asIs.title: 4. "As Is" Provision
asIs.content: The content and information on this website are provided "as is." We make no express or implied representations or warranties, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Under no circumstances shall we be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of this website or services provided through this website, including but not limited to loss of profits or data.

thirdParty.title: 6. Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: This website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, accuracy, or practices of these third-party sites. You access third-party websites at your own risk and must comply with their terms and conditions.

conduct.title: 7. User Conduct
items: Post any illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, or defamatory content on this website
Engage in spam, phishing, or fraudulent activities
Upload content containing viruses, malware, or any other code that may damage computers
Interfere with or bypass any security features of this website

account.title: 8. Account and Password
account.content: If this website provides user account features, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account.

termination.title: 9. Service Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or restrict your access to this website at any time for any reason or without cause. In such events, you are responsible for ceasing use of the website and destroying any downloaded or printed copies of content.

law.title: 10. Governing Law
law.content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the People's Republic of China. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved in the People's Courts of China.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through:

general.title: 1. General Disclaimer
general.content: This website and all its content (including but not limited to text, graphics, images, videos, audio, and data) are provided "as is." We strive to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the information, but we make no warranties regarding its accuracy, completeness, timeliness, or suitability.

technical.title: 2. Technical Information Disclaimer
technical.content: The technical information, specifications, and compatibility guides provided on this website are for reference purposes only. While we strive to ensure the accuracy of this information, we make no representations or warranties regarding its accuracy, completeness, or applicability.
technical.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Note: Please consult a professional technician before any installation or modification. Different vehicle and device combinations may have different compatibility issues.

installation.title: 3. Installation and Use Liability
installation.desc: When you use the information provided on this website for installation or any other operations, you do so entirely at your own risk. We are not responsible for:
items: Any other losses resulting from following our guidance

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Content and Links
thirdParty.content1: This website may contain links and content to third-party websites or providers. We are not responsible for the content, accuracy, legality, or completeness of these third-party resources.
thirdParty.content2: When accessing third-party websites or using third-party services, you must comply with their terms and conditions.

professional.title: 5. Professional Advice
professional.content: The content on this website should not be considered professional advice. For specific technical questions or concerns, please consult qualified professionals.

warranty.title: 6. Warranty Disclaimer
warranty.desc: Unless otherwise explicitly stated, we make no express or implied warranties regarding all content, products, and services provided on this website, including but not limited to:
items: Warranties of fitness for a particular purpose

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Under no circumstances shall we, our directors, employees, or agents be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages (including but not limited to loss of profits, business interruption, or data loss) arising from the use or inability to use this website, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

assumption.title: 8. Your Assumption of Risk
assumption.content: You agree that when using this website, you assume all risks. You expressly agree to release us from liability for any claims arising from the use of this website or information.

law.title: 9. Applicable Law
law.content: This disclaimer is governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. Any litigation related to this disclaimer shall be conducted in the People's Courts of China.

modifications.title: 10. Right to Modify
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this disclaimer at any time. Continued use of this website indicates your acceptance of any modifications.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this disclaimer, please contact us through:
